mapper.select:
select id, exam_desc, start_date, end_date, total_time, major, institute, exam_type, single_score, multi_score, judge_score, fill_score, total_score, single_ids, multi_ids, judge_ids, fill_ids from boot_vue_online_exam.exam where 1 = 1
AND e.exam_desc LIKE CONCAT('%',#{examDesc},'%')

select id, exam_desc, start_date, end_date, total_time, major, institute, exam_type, single_score, multi_score, judge_score, fill_score, total_score, single_ids, multi_ids, judge_ids, fill_ids from boot_vue_online_exam.exam where id = #{id}

select id, exam_desc, start_date, end_date, total_time, major, institute, exam_type, single_score, multi_score, judge_score, fill_score, total_score, single_ids, multi_ids, judge_ids, fill_ids from boot_vue_online_exam.exam limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into boot_vue_online_exam.exam(exam_desc, start_date, end_date, total_time, major, institute, exam_type, single_score, multi_score, judge_score, fill_score, total_score, single_ids, multi_ids, judge_ids, fill_ids) values (#{examDesc}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{totalTime}, #{major}, #{institute}, #{examType}, #{singleScore}, #{multiScore}, #{judgeScore}, #{fillScore}, #{totalScore}, #{singleIds}, #{multiIds}, #{judgeIds}, #{fillIds})
mapper.update:
update boot_vue_online_exam.exam
exam_desc = #{examDesc},
start_date = #{startDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
total_time = #{totalTime},
major = #{major},
institute = #{institute},
exam_type = #{examType},
single_score = #{singleScore},
multi_score = #{multiScore},
judge_score = #{judgeScore},
fill_score = #{fillScore},
total_score = #{totalScore},
single_ids = #{singleIds},
multi_ids = #{multiIds},
judge_ids = #{judgeIds},
fill_ids = #{fillIds},
where id = #{id}
